mapper.select: SELECT rule_id, channel_code, channel_type, bill_type, split_flg, payment_id, bank_seq, success_amount, fee_free, fee_service, fee_bank, trans_status, remark, field1, field2, field3, start_row, end_flg, create_time, create_author, update_time, update_author, settle_way, status FROM settle_rule_second a WHERE a.rule_id=#{ruleId}

SELECT rule_id, channel_code, channel_type, bill_type, split_flg, payment_id, bank_seq, success_amount, fee_free, fee_service, fee_bank, trans_status, remark, field1, field2, field3, start_row, end_flg, create_time, create_author, update_time, update_author, settle_way, status FROM settle_rule_second a WHERE a.channel_code=#{channelCode} and a.channel_type=#{channelType} and a.bill_type=#{billType} and a.settle_way=#{settleWay}
AND a.rule_id!=ruleId

update settle_rule_second
channel_code = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
channel_type = #{channelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bill_type = #{billType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
split_flg = #{splitFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payment_id = #{paymentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_seq = #{bankSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
success_amount = #{successAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
